00001 <?php
00020 class MOC_Api_Loader_Prefix {
00021     protected static $prefixes = array();
00022 
00028     public static function registerPrefix($prefix) {
00029         if (false !== array_search($prefix, self::$prefixes)) {
00030             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('Prefix "%s" has already been registered', $prefix));
00031         }
00032         self::$prefixes[] = $prefix;
00033     }
00034 
00040     public static function unregisterPrefix($prefix) {
00041         $key = array_search($prefix, self::$prefixes);
00042         if (false === $key) {
00043             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('Unable to unregister prefix "%s". It has not been registred', $prefix));
00044         }
00045         unset(self::$prefixes[$key]);
00046     }
00047 
00054     public static function getClassInstance($function) {
00055         if (empty(self::$prefixes)) {
00056             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception('No class prefixes has been registered');
00057         }
00058 
00059         if (empty($function) || !is_string($function)) {
00060             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception('Missing or invalid method name. Must be a string');
00061         }
00062 
00063         $methodAsClass = MOC_Inflector::underscore(MOC_Inflector::camelize($function));
00064         foreach (self::$prefixes as $prefix) {
00065             $className = $prefix . $methodAsClass;
00066             if (!class_exists($className)) {
00067                 continue;
00068             }
00069             $Object = new $className;
00070             return $Object;
00071         }
00072 
00073         throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('Unable to find a class for method "%s" (%s)', $function, $methodAsClass));
00074     }
00075 }
